attributes.action: Reduce fuel prices to 60p a litre, lets get transport running so the price of food can be sold cheaper
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fuel prices are far to high,which needs lowering this will help create work and willcreate a stronger economy and the price of food could be reduced in price.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to reduce fuel prices to 60p a litre, lets get transport running so the price of food can be sold cheaper.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=lowerfuel


Her Majesty's Government
